Constructor Detail

ParticleFilter

public ParticleFilter(List<P> startingState,
                      Updater<P> updater,
                      Measurer<P> measurer,
                      Resampler<P> resampler)
Parameters:
startingState - A list of particles initialized to the best guess of the starting state. Often this is just a uniform random distribution over the entire environment.
updater - Provides estimated future trajectories of particles in the absence of additional measurements.
measurer - Reweights particles based on new information about their likelihoods.
resampler - Removes unlikely particles and provides additional density near more likely states to concentrate the effort of the filter.
See Also:
DeadReckoningGaussianUpdater}, ImportanceResampler}
Method Detail

iterate

public List<P> iterate()
Updates the world state based on the current state, updater, measurer, and resampler

Returns:
updated world state
